original:
Scottish Amicable, one of the UK’s biggest mutual life insurers, is set to shed its mutual status and prepare for a £1bn flotation on the London Stock Market.
The move, which has been in the works for several months, is expected to provide a significant boost to the Scottish Amicable’s capital reserves and help secure its long-term future.
Founded in 1826, Scottish Amicable has long been a stalwar
sampled:
Scottish Amicable, one as the UK’s biggest mutual life insurers, is set to shed its mutual status and prepare for a £1bn flotation on the London Bourse Market.
The move, which has been in the designs for several months, is expected to provide a significant boost to the Scottish Amicable’s capital reserves and help secure its long-term future.
Founded in 1826, Scottish Amicable has long been a stalwar
